subject: Baseball
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: Bob Scheetz, a 45-year-old Phillies fan, has been holding court from his small corner of the sports universe. He has run the memorabilia department in the Hobby Shop for 20 years.
snippet: Bob Scheetz, a 45-year-old Phillies fan, has been holding court from his small corner of the sports universe. He has run the memorabilia department in the Hobby Shop for 20 years.
